descriptions.label: Debtor Risk Assessment (DRA)
descriptions.full: 1/10: Extremely high risk.  Global situation is very bad and close to critical/pre-insolvency.  Any commitment corresponds to an extremely high risk of default.  Also applies to Inactive company.

descriptions.label: Debtor Risk Assessment (DRA)
descriptions.full: 1/10: Extremely high risk.  Global situation is very bad and close to critical/pre-insolvency.  Any commitment corresponds to an extremely high risk of default.  Also applies to Inactive company.
